text.section:
Sec. 2-601. Commission of Inquiry created.
There is hereby created and established a Commission of Inquiry consisting of nine (9) members.
The mayor and each county commissioner shall nominate one (1) member to the Commission subject to ratification of five (5) additional members of the Board of County Commissioners. Each appointee shall have expertise in one or more of the following subject areas: building construction, architecture, engineering, construction finance, or construction law. No member or staff shall have had direct or indirect involvement in the design or construction of a building project in Miami-Dade County during the past five (5) years.
